channel.title: ubuntu on Phelipe Teles
channel.description: Recent content in ubuntu on Phelipe Teles

item.title: Coping with a work-issued Windows laptop
item.description: I recently switched job and was given a Windows laptop, which is fine but not ideal to me, since I’ve prefer to work with Unix-like environment and have invested a lot more time into perfecting those .

item.title: Ansible for dotfiles: the introduction I wish I've had
item.description: A dotfiles repo will help you manage configuration over time and synchronize them across machines, but it won’t help you with your dependencies – you still have to install git, tmux, vim, etc.
